changelog: Multi-language System, shortcut performance improvements, refined some utilities, new passcode lock functionality
bugs: Shortcut might not run properly without an official installation of All-in-One Utilities, language system only 14% complete, Chinese doesn't work as the github files are missing, language system can't detect if the language file is corrupt
actions: Test for crashes and bugs, check for missing strings, if shortcut starts acting weird get an official version of All-in-One Utilities and run the cleanup utility in [Other>Cleanup]
